title: Criminal Law (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2020 (No. 13 of 2020), and being
heading: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Civil Law and Criminal Law
text_raw:
1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Civil Law and Criminal Law 
(Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2020 (Section 29) (Legal Aid Board) 
(Designation) Order 2020. 

(2) This Order comes into operation on the 31st day of October 2020.
text_norm: 1 (1) order may cited civil law criminal law (miscellaneous provisions) act 2020 (section 29) (legal aid board) (designation) order 2020 (2) order come operation 31st day october 2020

title: Criminal Law (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2020 (No. 13 of 2020), and being
heading: 2. The Legal Aid Board is designated for the purposes of section 29 of the
text_raw:
2. The Legal Aid Board is designated for the purposes of section 29 of the 
Civil Law and Criminal Law (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2020 (No. 13 of 
2020). 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

28 October, 2020. 

HELEN MCENTEE, 

Minister for Justice and Equality. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 3rd November, 2020.
